CONTROLS:

attack - DRIVE MOUSE (PADDLE) INTO GHOST



this prototype was made for GDKO Round #1 under the theme, create a player with a unique ability

the games about a greek mythological half god named Charon, who is the ferryman of hell; very cool character, would suggest light reading

also, shmacking ghosts
